title: Into the Mind Soundtrack
description:
This is a story of rising to the ultimate challenge. Having the courage to risk fatal exposure and the perseverance demanded on the quest for achievement. These are not solely physical feats, they are mental conquests.

From the creators of the award winning film Ã¢â‚¬Å“All.I.CanÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Sherpas Cinema is proud to present their newest feature film, Into The Mind. With stunning cinematography and groundbreaking storytelling techniques, the Sherpas blur the lines between dream state and reality, and immerse you into the mind of a common skier as he attempts to climb and ski the ultimate mountain. 

While an "official" soundtrack has not been released, this torrent is compiled from the sounds credited at the end of the film. The files are named and tagged correctly, and are V0 or 320kbps. Enjoy the epic soundtrack--and get stoke to ski!

1.    Spindrift - Preacher's Theme
2.    Main Theme From Il Pistolero Dell' Ave Maria
3.    A Tribe Called Red - Electric Pow Wow Drum
4.    Beats Antique - Mission
5.    Woodkid - Run Boy Run
6.    Justice - Stress
7.    Puscifer - Tumbleweed
8.    Graham Nash - Better Days
9.    Lorde - Biting Down
10.    Pond - Giant Tortoise
11.    Brasstronaut - Slow Knots
12.    Kodaline - All I Want
13.    Spindrift - Red Reflection
